job.title: Senior Backend Developer (PHP, Laravel)
job.description:
We are currently seeking a Senior Backend Developer specializing in PHP and Laravel to be a key member of our dynamic team.

- Architect, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable PHP code using the Laravel framework.
- Lead the backend development team in achieving project milestones.
- Design and implement data storage solutions and optimize data retrieval.
- Integrate user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic.
- Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues.
- Work closely with the DevOps team to move projects from development to production environments.
- Provide technical guidance in planning, estimating, and executing projects.

Please attach your CVs.
